title: EIPIP Meeting 75
body:
# Date and Time
Feb 22, 2023 at 16:00 UTC

# Location
Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Live Stream/Recording: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw

# Agenda

### 1. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/6510
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/6509
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/6479
- [x] Discuss policy to add a champion or co-author to an EIP
- [x] Moving away from Jekyll. Discuss the options available.
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/215
- [x] [EIP authors feedback](https://bit.ly/EIPProcessFeedback)

### 2. Discussion continued from earlier meetings
- [x] Adding CL dev as EIP Editor & new ERC Editor
- [x] Thoughts on Asia Pacific (APAC) friendly call time on an infrequent reoccurring period such as once every 4 meetings? 
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/5682
- Change requested for `Final` EIPs
  - [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6330
  - [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6314 
  - [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5457
- [ ] Close [Open Issues](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues) 

### 3. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
[EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/february-2023)
[Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight/)

### 4. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Recording [Meeting 12](https://youtu.be/2hRpD7Ex3wI)
- [Agenda Meeting 13](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/216)

### 5. Review action items from earlier meetings
Prev. meeting [notes 74](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20074.md)

Next meeting - Mar 08, 2023?

### **Summary**

- Issue-6510: General consensus is to move ahead with this change. The proposal will allow optional information of adding the email addresses of authors in addition to the mandatory Github handles.
  -  @SamWilsn will update EIPW, @Pandapip1 will update eth-bot and make the PR/changes 
- Issue - 6509: @Pandapip1 will add the format to the issue, and could be discussed further.
- Issue-6479: Go ahead with the proposal, and make the PR the general consensus.
- Discuss policy to add a champion or co-author to an EIP: The group discussed the "adoptable" proposal by @Pandapip1. No decision was made in absence of @lightclients as he may want to add thoughts. Discuss this in the next meeting.
- Moving away from Jekyll: @Pandapip1 shared the alternate page https://eips.pandapip1.com/ He will make PR to proceed.
- PR-6483: @Pandapip1 wants it to be split into 2 PRs. 
  - PandaPip will share the new website which kind of already solves the problem. 
- Consider responding to [EIP authors' feedback](https://bit.ly/EIPProcessFeedback)
  - I mistakenly mentioned the wrong category of EIP-4736: CLWP on the call. It is the `Interface` category. `Networking` EIPs are [EIP-4938](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4938) & [EIP-5793](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5793)
-  Adding CL dev as EIP Editor & new ERC Editor: Joined by [2 new editors](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders/status/1628380724406456326)
- EIPIP meeting new time will be **14:00 UTC**
- PR-6269: Sam isn't in favor, Panda is. We will collect more comments in PR to take a decision. 
- Issue - 5682: No consensus
- PR - 6330: No name change to `Final. Discuss it with the author on the PR.
- PR - 6314: Merged
- PR - 5457: Will be reviewed again.
